subtitle: GROUP-ALIGNED OVERSIGHT
storyParagraphs: PAG operates within a structured governance ecosystem aligned with group-level corporate doctrine and applicable regulatory frameworks in its jurisdictions of incorporation and operation.

This governance model supports delegation discipline, risk control, compliance oversight, and financial accountability while preserving clear separation between structuring authority and execution responsibility.

storyQuote.text: Institutional credibility is built on enforceable structure, clear accountability boundaries, and disciplined oversight.
